short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U: To convert the web page to Foxit PDF
short.da: For at konvertere websiden til Foxit PDF
short.de: Die Webseite in Foxit PDF-Datei umwandeln
short.es_419: Para convertir la página web a Foxit PDF
short.fr: Pour convertir la page Web en Foxit PDF
short.it: Per convertire la pagina Web in Foxit PDF
short.ja: Web ページを Foxit PDF に変換
short.nl: De webpagina converteren naar Foxit PDF
short.no: Slik konverterer du nettsiden til Foxit PDF
short.pl: Aby przekonwertować stronę internetową do pliku Foxit PDF
short.pt_BR: Para converter a página da Web em um Foxit PDF
short.pt_PT: Para converter a página Web em PDF Foxit
short.sv: För att konvertera webbplatsen till Foxit PDF
short.zh_TW: 將網頁轉換成 Foxit PDF

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U: This plugin is used to convert the webpages to PDF. Users can set the layout, add watermarks, headers/footers, and apply security settings for the PDF during conversion. Foxit PDF Editor is required to use this plugin. For more information, go to www.foxit.com.
long.da,de,es_419,fi,fr,it,ja,ko,nl,no,pl,pt_: This plugin is used to convert the webpages to PDF. Users can set the layout, add watermarks, headers/footers, and apply security settings for the PDF during conversion. Foxit PhantomPDF is required to use this plugin. For more information, go to www.foxitsoftware.com.
